title: The Owl and the pussycat
creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: A film of Barbara Cooney’s illustrations to Edward Lear’s poem. The owl and the pussycat travel in a pea-green boat to the land of Bong-tree where they are married by the turkey who lives on the hill. Photographed by Alexander Cochran. Suitable for primary school level.
